Package sharedRegions

Class BagColPoint

java.lang.Object
sharedRegions.BagColPoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
BCPPassenger, BCPPorter
public class BagColPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements BCPPassenger, BCPPorter
Implementation of the Baggage Collection Point Shared Memory The passenger come here to fetch their baggage, put on the conveyor belt by the porter. It waits till the Porter flags that there's no more baggage on the plane hold.

  • Method Details

    • goCollectABag

      public void goCollectABag()
      Description copied from interface: BCPPassenger
      Passenger goes to Baggage Collection Point trying to collect it's bags. It waits for the Porter to put the bag on the conveyor belt. If it's one of their bags, they go try to collect it. A passenger can only collect one bag per attempt.
      Specified by:
      goCollectABag in interface BCPPassenger

    • carryItToAppropriateStore

      public void carryItToAppropriateStore​(int[] bag)
      Description copied from interface: BCPPorter
      Move a bag from the plane hold to the bag collection point.
      Specified by:
      carryItToAppropriateStore in interface BCPPorter
      Parameters:
      bag - Bag to be moved to the bag collection point.

    • setNoMoreBags

      public void setNoMoreBags​(boolean noMoreBags)
      Set the variable no more bags. Notifies all threads.
      Parameters:
      noMoreBags - True if there are no more bags in the plane hold or False otherwise.

    • resetBagColPoint

      public void resetBagColPoint()
      Reset the variables for the next flight.
